notes:
## ⚡ Powers:

- For maximum tankage and even some support capability, we take [To Me, My Friends!](item_9bd5bb9d-8026-4092-80c5-21e726c0969f). This power heals not only allies but Reinhardt himself! So when you're in a pickle, you pop up your shield and get healed a bit. No more relying on just your supports who picked [Zenyatta](hero_3c4002ee-e694-48ed-9730-70fd48773317) and [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed) when you wanted to play Rein...

## 💣 Items:

- First, we take [Frenzy Amplifier](item_d4b0cfcb-14e9-4472-a688-680120217250) to help us snowball and get multikills when it's our time to strike!
- Second, I like to take [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) for slightly faster swings. I prefer swing speed over [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0), but you are welcome to take that instead.
- Finally, take [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318). This will help keep us alive when we go to swing.

## 🎮 Playstyle:

- Play super safe around corners where the enemy can't damage you. Try not to stress out your supports so much by taking infinite damage.
- Swing on anyone who gets near you to farm money. We need that stuff real bad, and doing damage and healing yourself helps get us there.
- Stay alive at all costs using Charge and your Barrier. **This is more important than kills!**

## ⚙️ Optionals:
- Like I said before, you can take [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) instead of [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) if you really want. I barely notice a difference either way.

round_upgrades.notes: I like swing speed more than WP because hitting more is better than less consistent hit with greater power.
The precursor to Gloomgauntlet. Helps keep you alive.
This power also heals you and can help keep your friends alive.

notes:
## 💣 Items:

- Next, we add [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09). This helps us take less damage from weapons when we are at full health.
- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418) are here to improve our stats as much as possible. More stats equal more money! And we need that to stay caught up.

## 🎮 Playstyle:

- Farm as much money as possible whilst not dying. If you're dead, you can't farm cash. 

## ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you can afford it, take [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) to synergize with [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09) and don't take [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418).
- If you can afford another rare item, pick up [Overclocked Barrier](item_e82af99e-3116-4867-b8a4-52c7dfd1d7e9) or [Aftermarket Firing Pin](item_2485b212-b286-42d0-a2bd-20eb4396b054). These items can help you heal longer with your shield or swing more for more damage. Both get you more money!

round_upgrades.notes: If you have extra cash and need help living.
If you have extra cash and wanna swing harder.
Helps us resist annoying weapon builds
This power also heals you and can help keep your friends alive.

notes:
## ⚡ Powers:

- Now we pick up [Infusion Generator](item_8aee4021-0d2f-481c-b811-135f2d0fabd8) to make our barrier able to take more damage, scaling with our health. Combined with [To Me, My Friends!](item_9bd5bb9d-8026-4092-80c5-21e726c0969f), we can heal ourselves longer before we need to get to cover.

## 💣 Items:

- This round, we sell [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418)  and [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0)  our items to make room for [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) and [Aftermarket Firing Pin](item_2485b212-b286-42d0-a2bd-20eb4396b054). These are good Reinhardt items that synergize well with his natural armor and want to swing on people.

## 🎮 Playstyle:
 
- You should be playing like an anchor on the objective. You are your team's rock and shield. You play corners and make space for your team while not taking unnecessary damage. You heal yourself behind your big shield and can protect others around you. Become a wall that the enemy can't ignore.

## ⚙️ Optionals:

-Keep [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09) and [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) as long as possible.

- Consider [Overclocked Barrier](item_e82af99e-3116-4867-b8a4-52c7dfd1d7e9) if you have the cash.

round_upgrades.notes: This power also heals you and can help keep your friends alive.

notes:
## 💣 Items:

- This round we pick up [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f) to really boost our kill potential. 
- In my experience, Earthshatter is difficult to get off and doesn't get much value when it does. The stat boost from [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f) is well worth the trade-off.

## 🎮 Playstyle:

- It's the same as the previous round, except now you are playing to get your Ultimate as fast as possible for [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f), then you can be more aggressive with your swings.
- Once you get low and need to escape, use your shield to back off and heal yourself, and even Charge away if needed. Once you're healed, get back to playing aggressively.

## ⚙️ Optionals:

If you have extra cash;

- [Overclocked Barrier](item_e82af99e-3116-4867-b8a4-52c7dfd1d7e9) and [Aftermarket Firing Pin](item_2485b212-b286-42d0-a2bd-20eb4396b054) are always good.
- [Gloomgauntlet](item_76cb8fe3-3c1f-4769-a1ec-a9c2dc510ba7) is an excellent tool for survival, and if you can sell your common items to get it, I recommend it.

round_upgrades.notes: Great if you can afford it!
This power also heals you and can help keep your friends alive.

notes:
## ⚡ Powers:

- By now, you might've noticed that your shield likes to be broken a lot. To fix that, I take [Barrier Reconstruction](item_ecd5cf3c-0293-42e9-b015-0b00c25082f5). The strategy is to go in with your shield, swing a bunch to try and get picks, and to heal your shield, then retreat to cover behind your shield.

- If you have good shield management and feel you don't need [Barrier Reconstruction](item_ecd5cf3c-0293-42e9-b015-0b00c25082f5), then I would take [Vanguard](item_228cf103-0be8-4f1c-8780-f3a8d8676abf) to make you more tanky and speedy during Charge.

- Alternatively, you can take [Vroom Boom Boom](item_b016a02c-50bd-4010-91bb-661c1101ade7) if you want your Charge's pin to do more damage. I would not recommend this into pin counters like [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), [Kiriko](hero_70a0ac5c-2a55-4fab-beeb-2f570886426f), or [Ana](hero_f1aee6cf-704f-455f-a100-ec882ebbe000).

## 💣 Items:

- [Gloomgauntlet](item_76cb8fe3-3c1f-4769-a1ec-a9c2dc510ba7) is vital to longer sustained swings on the enemy. The longer you can swing, the more damage you can do.
- Sell [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318). With  [Gloomgauntlet](item_76cb8fe3-3c1f-4769-a1ec-a9c2dc510ba7) you would much rather have something like [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) to boost your attack speed.

## 🎮 Playstyle:

- You can play much more aggressively now with your extra bulk and damage. Be sure to activate [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f) as soon as possible and play safer until you do.
- You are still Reinhardt, and you will explode if you do not play carefully. Even with all these tanky upgrades.

## ⚙️ Optionals:

- With extra cash, pick up [Ogundimu Reduction Field](item_b12daf48-069b-44c1-88fe-221cbcff664d) early to increase your damage resistance.
- If the enemy has lots of burst damage, take [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) instead.

round_upgrades.notes: More damage and sustain while swinging.
I can get away with big charge
This power also heals you and can help keep your friends alive.
Shield hurt and need heal faster

notes:
## 💣 Items:

- [Ogundimu Reduction Field](item_b12daf48-069b-44c1-88fe-221cbcff664d) is a great defensive tool against Heroes with sustained damage like [Zarya](hero_be6cc516-0b7a-4515-8472-f489f08993b0), [Soldier: 76](hero_e1ac7ef5-4648-4998-b8b0-9e3da3e60546), [Mei](hero_36fd67f0-19df-4c50-add9-709cfb147cb0), and [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed).
- If you're facing a team comp with more burst damage like [Junker Queen](hero_4794d288-27d9-49e0-a1dd-ffe0f4de3ab1), [Junkrat](hero_3ac20f6c-2bce-45f3-998e-9129cc6e5c05), or [Juno](hero_035c63b7-084c-4abd-9de5-c9a00e9b6a18), then [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) should be bought instead.

## 🎮 Playstyle:

- Much the same as before, but you now should be even more tanky and should be last to die every fight. Go for anyone who dares to get too close to you with little fear.

## ⚙️ Optionals:

If you are still having issues with healing, then pick up [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98) to *really* pump your heals into overdrive.

round_upgrades.notes: This power also heals you and can help keep your friends alive.
Shield hurt and need heal faster

notes:
## ⚡ Powers:

- Here at the end, take whichever power you want and didn't take during Round 5. My personal recommendation is [Barrier Reconstruction](item_ecd5cf3c-0293-42e9-b015-0b00c25082f5) and [Vanguard](item_228cf103-0be8-4f1c-8780-f3a8d8676abf).

## 💣 Items:

- [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f) and [Gloomgauntlet](item_76cb8fe3-3c1f-4769-a1ec-a9c2dc510ba7) are core to the build and must stay.

- Take both [Ogundimu Reduction Field](item_b12daf48-069b-44c1-88fe-221cbcff664d) and [Phantasmic Flux](item_5e644a79-cf6e-4196-8d0a-232f75004643) to stay alive.

- [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09) will stay to keep the initial damage reduction with armor.

- [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) helps keep [Crusader Hydraulics](item_b64cee07-ca32-405d-987e-868b415bbc09) online for longer.

## 🎮 Playstyle:

- The goal is simple. Stay alive as long as you can while being a problem for the enemy team. Annoy them as much as possible while keeping yourself and your team alive as long as possible. Let your supports worry about other things than keeping you alive. Swing when you can and keep [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f) active unless you see a game-winning shatter opportunity.

## ⚙️ Optionals:

You can sell [Vital-E-Tee](item_b92e6f1d-3aac-4eec-b027-00c8e1529016) for one of three items:

- [Wilhelmwagen](item_c6b943ef-1941-4979-81dd-8848a171326e) for extra speed while shielding.
- [Martian Mender](item_0099632b-4e18-450e-844f-22c40e51bc98) if you still don't have enough healing.
- [Divine Intervention](item_b5148b7f-8529-4b1b-a90c-5d7cf13f8f0c) if you are having issues with burst builds like Ability Power [Junker Queen](hero_4794d288-27d9-49e0-a1dd-ffe0f4de3ab1) or [Juno](hero_035c63b7-084c-4abd-9de5-c9a00e9b6a18).
